title: Glotti Intro Video - Script Variant C

segments.title: Setup
segments.prompt: High-octane, personal, and slightly breathless. Sound like you're actually about to enter a high-stakes arena. Emphasize 'interrupt me, challenge me, and judge me'.
segments.text:
[Screen: Camera on you, high energy]

Voiceover:
"I built an AI that's designed to interrupt me, challenge me, and judge me. Let's see if I can survive three minutes with it."

"I'm going to pitch my project to the hardest VC in the world — an AI that's been programmed to tear me apart."

segments.title: Problem Statement
segments.prompt: Vulnerable but clear. Speak with the conviction of someone who has actually faced this problem. Use a more grounded, serious tone compared to the high-energy hook.
segments.text:
[Screen: Quick cut to the Mode Select screen]

Voiceover:
"There's no good way to practice high-stakes conversations. Friends are too nice. Coaches are expensive. I wanted something that felt real."

segments.title: Full PitchPerfect Session
segments.content: Run a real ~2 minute session. Let interactions play out.
segments.prompt: Authentic and live. Don't sound like you're reading a script—sound like you're actually pitching. React with genuine surprise if the AI interrupts. The final voiceover should sound slightly out of breath but impressed.
segments.text:
[Screen: Start PitchPerfect session — Full screen app]

[Action: Start the pitch. Do not rehearse too much — genuine stumbles make it authentic.]

[Keep talking as the AI challenges you. Let it interrupt. React naturally.]

Voiceover:
"Okay, that was brutal. But that's the point — in a real investor meeting, that's exactly what happens."

[Action: Pitch Glotti itself to the AI VC. Let the waveforms clash as you both talk.]

segments.title: Report Reaction
segments.content: React to your score genuinely. Scroll through feedback.
segments.prompt: Genuine and analytical. Sound slightly humbled by the score, then transition to a more hopeful tone as you read the improvement tips. Let your personality shine through on the 'Ouch'.
segments.text:
[Screen: End session → Report page appears]

Voiceover:
"Let's see how I did..."

[Action: Scroll to the circular gauge and let it fill]

"A [X] out of 10. Ouch. Let's see what it says... 'Weakest link: market articulation.' Yeah, that's fair."

segments.title: Feature Summary
segments.content: Quick montage of other modes and share modal.
segments.prompt: Rapid-fire and efficient. Emphasize the completeness of the platform. Sound like you've just proven the product works and are now showing the scope.
segments.text:
[Screen: Quick montage: EmpathyTrainer, Veritalk, Impromptu cards]

Voiceover:
"Four modes. Real-time AI that listens, interrupts, and coaches. Full performance reports. All powered by Gemini Live API."

[Action: Show session history list and open a share modal]

segments.title: Architecture Flash
segments.content: Quick flash of the diagram + tech stack.
segments.prompt: Concise and authoritative. Speed through the tech abbreviations while remaining crystal clear. Sound proud of the lightweight but powerful architecture.
segments.text:
[Screen: Architecture diagram]

Voiceover:
"The stack is lightweight: Node.js, React, and Gemini 2.5 on Google Cloud Run. Scalable, fast, and 100% multimodal."

segments.title: Closing
segments.prompt: End with a wink. Sound challenging but inviting. Make the URL the most memorable part of the whole script. Leave with high confidence.
segments.text:
[Screen: Final logo and URL]

Voiceover:
"Think you can beat my score? Try it for yourself at glotti.pbartz.net."
